ygData.subject: RE: Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: If you sneak thru they won t react either.  They apparently hear you even if invis, but when I snuck thru with invis to undead they didnt react even though I
ygData.messageBody:
If you sneak thru they won't react either. They apparently 'hear' you even
if invis, but when I snuck thru with invis to undead they didnt react even
though I almost bumped into one walking around the corner.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Miriana [mailto:miriana@...]
Sent: Saturday, October 09, 1999 10:09 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise


From: Miriana <miriana@...>

On Sat, 9 Oct 1999 kim@... wrote:

> The greater ice bones could see through the invis to undead
> cast by my L35 cleric friend. Dunno if they can see through
> if it's cast by a higher level person.
>

They can, but if you hug the right wall, they are slow enough to
react where they will leave you alone... if you're invis vs undead. It's
weird. I've never failed to pull the gibs if I wasn't invis. But if I
was invis, I had to in addition hug the right side of that hall.

Miriana Windryder

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
